H0.text: Expanding universe is what astronomers term the stretching of space that causes the distance between galaxies to increase.

H1.text: Maintaining universe is the term astronomers use for the stretching of space that causes the distance between galaxies to increase.

H2.text: The draining universe is what astronomers term the stretching of space that causes the distance between galaxies to increase.

H3.text: Contracting universe is the term astronomers use to describe the stretching of space that causes the distance between galaxies to increase.

A4.text: The expansion of the universe is the increase in distance between gravitationally unbound parts of the observable universe with time.
